CareerDescription: I design, development and/or apply computational models in solving problems applying the principles of basic sciences and engineering.
AboutMePart1: I am a graduate of the Technological Institute of Tepic with a career in computer system engineering, and I am also a programming technician. I started in the world of programming when I was 15 years old, developing small points of sale. I am currently specializing in technologies such as Angular for the client side, as well as ASP.Net Core, SQL and IIS for the server side.
AboutMePart2: I like to create attractive, modern and innovative web interfaces using UX/IX design. As for the server part, I am inclined to create REST APIs. In general, I like logic challenges, solving complex problems and taking on projects that represent a challenge for me.
DIMEDescriptionText: This website was developed for the non-profit organization DIME which is a comprehensive center for people with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus, providing care to improve the quality of diabetes patients and their families.
COVIDDescriptionText: This website shows general information about COVID 19, this web page was developed as a school project to publicize real data about the pandemic, a section for blogs was also developed using Laravel.
